title: PhoneGap Developer
jobDescription:
Hunter Tech Ventures Pvt Ltd is looking for PhoneGap Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • We are seeking a skilled PhoneGap Developer to join our team
  • The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing mobile applications using PhoneGap, an open-source framework for building cross-platform mobile apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • The PhoneGap Developer will work closely with our development team to create innovative and user-friendly mobile applications that meet our clients' needs
Responsibilities:
  • Develop mobile applications using PhoneGap framework
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
  • Work with external data sources and APIs
  • Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices

title: Hybrid Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• Hands on experience with ionic versions & latest version features.
  • Familiar with performing framework upgrades on apps.
  • Hands on experience in identifying performance bottlenecks by debugging/profiling for mobile (ionic) as well as web (NodeJS)
  • Practical experiencing in deploying mobile Apps to store and web apps to server (NodeJS)
  • Minimum experience 2 years
  • Usage of version control tools like GIT
  • Experience with Angular v2/v4/v7/v8, HTML5/JS/CSS3, Typescript, Swift and Java (Added Advantage)
  • Experience with MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Google firebase.
  • Interested freshers can apply but will be considered as trainee.
Responsibilities
  • Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
  • Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
  • Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
  • Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
  • Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
  • Design interfaces to improve user experience
  • Liaise with Product development team to plan new features
  • No limit in salary for the right candidate.
  • Tea, Coffee and Green Tea available all day.
  • Employee development programs: Video Training Sessions.
  • Paid Sick Leaves.
  • The payoff for extra Working Days (Weekdays).
    • An open, collaborative, trusting culture and friendly environment with no stress.
    • Teammates that embody our core values
    • Annual team trips
    • Birthday and work anniversary surprises/gifts for the employees.
    • Weekend Games & other refreshing activities for the team.
    • Celebrating festivals together.
    • Daily breaks in addition to an hour lunch break.
